Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit his 55th home run of the season
Gleyber Torres and Jasson Domínguez also went deep
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees moved closer to an AL East title
The A's drew 24,663 in the Yankees’ series finale on Sunday
Others: The A's will play in Sacramento next season ahead of a planned move to Las Vegas in 2028
The Yankees opened a two-game lead over Cleveland for homefield advantage throughout the AL playoffs
